languages.text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

traits.locale_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Fellowship, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

languages.text: 要塞世界的角色在战斗时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高7点。但不处于战斗状态时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、感知与意志会降低7点。
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

traits.locale_text: 要塞世界的角色在战斗时，弹道技能、感知与意志提高7点。但不处于战斗状态时，智力、友谊、感知与意志会降低7点。

languages.text: Los personajes de mundo fortaleza ganan +7 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} durante el combate. Sin embargo, fuera del combate su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, Percepción y Voluntad se reducen en −7.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes de mundo fortaleza ganan +7 a su Habilidad de proyectiles, Percepción y Voluntad durante el combate. Sin embargo, fuera del combate su Inteligencia, Empatía, Percepción y Voluntad se reducen en −7.

languages.text: Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere erhalten +7 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, wenn sie sich im Kampf befinden. Außerhalb des Kampfes verringern sich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, Wahrnehmung und Willenskraft jedoch um −7.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

traits.locale_text: Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere erhalten +7 Ballistik-Fähigkeit und Willenskraft, wenn sie sich im Kampf befinden. Außerhalb des Kampfes verringern sich ihre Intelligenz, Gefolgschaft, Wahrnehmung und Willenskraft jedoch um -7.

languages.text: Les personnages des mondes forteresses bénéficient de +7 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} lorsqu'ils sont au combat. En revanche, en dehors des combats, leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, leur Perception et leur Force mentale sont réduites de −7.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

traits.locale_text: Les personnages des mondes forteresses bénéficient de +7 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} lorsqu'ils sont au combat. En revanche, en dehors des combats, leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, leur Sociabilité, leur Perception et leur Force mentale sont réduites de −7.

languages.text: В бою персонаж с мира-крепости получает +7 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}. При этом вне боя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}, Восприятие и Воля персонажа снижаются на 7.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

traits.locale_text: В бою персонаж из мира-крепости получает +7 к Дальнему Бою, Восприятию и Воле. При этом вне боя Интеллект, Общительность, Восприятие и Воля персонажа снижаются на 7.

languages.text: 要塞惑星のキャラクターは戦闘の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}が+7増加する。ただし戦闘以外では、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}が-7減少する。
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.

traits.locale_text: 要塞惑星のキャラクターは戦闘の間、弾道スキル、認知力、意志力が+7増加する。ただし戦闘以外では、知性、連帯、認知力、意志力が-7減少する。

languages.text: Kale dünya karakterleri; çatışmadayken {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerine +7 kazanırlar. Çatışma dışında ise {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g}, Algı ve İrade nitelikleri 7'şer puan azalır.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters gain +7 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} while in combat. Yet while out of combat, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, Perception, and Willpower are decreased by −7.
